sourcesContent:
import "./myProfile.css"; import React, { FunctionComponent, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { resourceEndPoint } from "../../API/apiEndpoint"; import { Edit } from "@mui/icons-material"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Form, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import { updateUser } from "../../API/userApi"; import { AuthAction } from "../../redux/reducer"; interface MyProfileProps {} const MyProfile: FunctionComponent = () => { const token = useSelector((state: any) => state.auth.token); const userId = useSelector((state: any) => state.auth.userId); let dispatch = useDispatch() const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const profileRef = React.useRef(null) const ageRef = React.useRef(null) const addressRef = React.useRef(null) const pincodeRef = React.useRef(null) const maritalRef = React.useRef(null) const bloodGroupRef = React.useRef(null) const masterDegreeRef = React.useRef(null) const masterUniversityRef = React.useRef(null) const graduationDegreeRef = React.useRef(null) const graduationUniversityRef = React.useRef(null) const hobbieRef = React.useRef(null) const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); event.stopPropagation(); } setValidated(true); }; const multimediaConfig = { headers: { "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data", Authorization: "Bearer " + token, }, }; let location = useLocation(); const userData = useSelector((state: any) => state.auth.userData); return (
setShowModal(false)} > Update Info
Change Profile Age Please provide age. Address Please provide address Pincode Please provide pincode. Blood Group Please provide blood group Hobbies Please provide Hobbies Marital Status Please provide Marital Status Masters Please provide a degree Please provide a university Graduation Please provide a degree Please provide a university
{!location.state && (
setShowModal(true)} className="myprofile-container__edit" >
)}

{location.state ? location.state.item.Name : userData.Name}

Email

{location.state ? location.state.item.Email : userData.Email}

Age

{location.state ? location.state.item.Age : userData.Age}

Address

{location.state ? location.state.item.Address + ` -${location.state.item.Pincode}` : userData.Address + ` -${userData.Pincode}`}

Blood Group

{location.state ? location.state.item.BloodGroup : userData.BloodGroup}

Marital Status

{location.state ? location.state.item.MaritalStatus : userData.MaritalStatus}

Mobile Number

{location.state ? location.state.item.MobileNumber : userData.MobileNumber}

Education

Masters

{location.state ? location.state.item.Education.Masters.Degree : userData.Education.Masters.Degree}

{location.state ? location.state.item.Education.Masters.University : userData.Education.Masters.University}

Graduation

{location.state ? location.state.item.Education.Graduation.Degree : userData.Education.Graduation.Degree}

{location.state ? location.state.item.Education.Graduation.Univerisity : userData.Education.Graduation.Univerisity}

); }; export default MyProfile;
